## FAQ

**Q: Is my sponsorship tax-deductible?**
A: GitHub Sponsors payments may be tax-deductible depending on your location. Consult your tax advisor.

**Q: Can I sponsor anonymously?**
A: Yes! You can choose to remain anonymous when setting up your sponsorship.

**Q: Can I cancel anytime?**
A: Absolutely! You can cancel your sponsorship at any time, no questions asked.

**Q: Do you offer invoices?**
A: Yes! GitHub Sponsors provides invoices for all payments.

**Q: What if I need custom features?**
A: Contact me directly for enterprise sponsorship and custom development.

**Q: Can my company sponsor?**
A: Yes! Many companies sponsor open-source projects. GitHub Sponsors supports company accounts.
